name: Kamikaze Safari
description: Kamikaze Safari is a submission for 2020 Jamfuser game jam following the theme of "Leap".  Kamikaze Safari is an RTS where the player has to control his leap of leopards to take control over the water hole in a PVE scenario.  For the theme we've combined a verb version of leap which means moving quickly and suddenly, as well as the noun leap of leopards meaning a group of leopards.
